useCase.name: Manage Court Details

preconditions.precondition: User has access to the account details page

successEndConditions.condition: All necessary court details are entered successfully

useCase.trigger: User clicks on the Court Details link

mainSequence.step: User clicks on the Court Details link
Navigate to the Court Details page
Retrieve Local Justice Areas records from the Fines Database (JPA)
Display Local Justice Areas records in JSON format
Retrieve Courts records from the Fines Database (JPA)
Display Courts records in JSON format
Enter Court details and click Return to account details
Navigate back to the account details page
